newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Stryker raised to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Stryker raised to buy.

text.p: -- Jefferies & Co Inc said its analyst Carol Winslow raised her rating on shares of Stryker Corp to buy from accumulate.

-- In a statement, Winslow noted Stryker's accelerating growth rate that has been masked by the loss of low margin original equipment manufacturer products in Japan and a recent, market-related sell-off of shares that has created a buying opportunity.
-- Styker is a medical device company.
-- Its shares were off 1/4 at 24-5/8 at mid-afternoon.
